strings.Value: {n}The shaman turns and sees you. His eyes go wide and he points his finger at you.{/n} "Dur borba! Kill meatsss!"
"Ssspeak!" {n}The kobold student echoes shrilly, then snorts in what might be a laugh.{/n}
{n}The shaman stares at the student for a while, hissing wordlessly, then turns to the others.{/n} "Gulb. Eat."
"Borba wordsss. Lisssten closssely. And ssspeak after!"
{n}A kobold shaman, clad in long flowing robes, swaggers back and forth before the gathered trolls and kobolds. His posture is proud, strict, and imbued with dignity.{/n}
